cast.name: 卡梅隆·恩格斯 Camaron Engels

director.name: 伊凡尼·埃齐姆 Ifeanyi Ezieme

introduction: Scam Squad is a comedy crime drama independently created by Ifeanyi Ezieme. This 6 episode limited series follows a group of nomadic, parentless teens who live off the grid. Each possessing a unique skill set of their own, they create a successful scamming operation to keep them afloat while remaining under the radar. However, news of a loved one's murder triggers a revenge mission that puts them at risk of exposure. Now, the squad must use their talents to anonymously execute a task that none of them has ever done - kill.
